name: Total Smashout!
description:
WELCOME GLADIATORS!

Jump right into battle and see how long you can last on the Total Smashout platform! Great for any player, simple or complex, knock out as many opponents as you can before they have a chance to get you. Explore countless combinations of different weapons & upgrades to see what style best fits you with new upgrade packs available monthly.

Customize your settings from controls, to graphics, to online preferences.

On itch.io the scoreboard doesn't seem to work, however you can either get the app or play the web version to get the scoreboard. (You should do this, its the best bit)

Good luck,

KNOCKOUT!
